author: relmer_250867
title: Great stay at grat location
text: Loved the hotel from beginning to end, sand in tour desk was great, rooms big enough, close to subway line 2 and 5 that can take to all spots in Beijing with only one change. On floor 4 itÂ´s an easy access to the mall with some good restaurant's specially the Green tea is really good
